org.interledger.ilp

インタフェース InterledgerProtocolError

  • すべてのスーパーインタフェース:
    InterledgerPacket
    既知の実装クラスのリスト:
    InterledgerProtocolError.AbstractInterledgerProtocolError

    public interface InterledgerProtocolError
extends InterledgerPacket

    Interledger errors may be generated at any point during an Interledger payment.

    For example, Connectors that are notified that an outgoing transfer was rejected MUST reject the corresponding incoming transfer with the same error.

    Additionally, Connectors SHOULD include their ILP address in the forwardedBy field in the error. Connectors SHOULD NOT modify errors in any other way.

    関連項目:
    "https://github.com/interledger/rfcs/blob/master/0003-interledger-protocol/0003-interledger -protocol.md#ilp-error-format"

    • ネストされたクラスのサマリー

      ネストされたクラス 
      修飾子とタイプ インタフェースと説明
      static class  InterledgerProtocolError.AbstractInterledgerProtocolError 
      static interface  InterledgerProtocolError.ErrorCode
      Inspired by HTTP Status Codes, ILP error codes are categorized based upon the intended behavior of the caller when they receive the given error.

      • インタフェースから継承されたネストされたクラス/インタフェース org.interledger.InterledgerPacket

        InterledgerPacket.Handler<R>, InterledgerPacket.VoidHandler

      • builder

        static InterledgerProtocolErrorBuilder builder()
        Get the default builder.
        戻り値:
        a InterledgerProtocolErrorBuilder instance.

      • getErrorCode

        InterledgerProtocolError.ErrorCode getErrorCode()

      • getForwardedByAddresses

        List<InterledgerAddress> getForwardedByAddresses()
        ILP addresses of any connectors that relayed the error message.
        戻り値:

      • getData

        Optional<byte[]> getData()
        Optional error data, provided for debugging purposes.

      • withForwardedAddress

        static InterledgerProtocolError withForwardedAddress(InterledgerProtocolError interledgerProtocolError,
                                                     InterledgerAddress forwardedByAddress)

        Constructs an InterledgerProtocolError that wraps an existing error and adds a new forwardedBy address to the list.

        Per IL-RFC-3, when a node receives an Interledger error, it SHOULD not change any of the details about the error, except for adding itself to the forwarded-by list, if desired.

        パラメータ:
        interledgerProtocolError - An existing error that will eventually be forwarded.
        forwardedByAddress - A InterledgerAddress to be added to the list of forwarders.
        戻り値:
        a new instance of InterledgerProtocolError with forwardedByAddress data
